titles.title: A resolution to make effective reappointment of Deputy Senate Legal Counsel.
A resolution to make effective reappointment of Deputy Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Makes the reappointment of Morgan J. Frankel as Deputy Senate Legal Counsel effective as of January 3, 2003, until the end of the 109th Congress.
